courses.title: Ballet Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of ballet with our comprehensive beginner's course.

courses.title: Hip-Hop for Beginners
courses.description: Start your dance journey with foundational hip-hop moves taught by expert instructors.

courses.title: Advanced Contemporary Techniques
courses.description: Enhance your contemporary dance skills with advanced techniques for intermediate to advanced learners.

courses.title: Salsa Mastery
courses.description: Master the art of salsa dancing with our comprehensive course covering all skill levels.

courses.title: Jazz Dance Improvisation
courses.description: Learn the art of jazz dance improvisation with this course designed for all levels.

courses.title: Choreography Fundamentals
courses.description: Dive into choreography with an introductory course on creating and structuring dance routines.

courses.title: Freestyle Dance Essentials
courses.description: Learn the essentials of freestyle dance to express your creativity through movement.

courses.title: Breakdancing Techniques
courses.description: Master the art of breakdancing with moves for beginners to advanced dancers.

courses.title: History of Dance
courses.description: Explore the rich history of dance from its origins to modern styles.

courses.title: Latin Dance Styles
courses.description: Discover the techniques of Latin dance styles, including Salsa, Bachata, and Merengue.
